name: Overglide - Widget Game
description:
Overglide, the game widget that lets you play anywhere, anytime, directly from the notification screen and even while your iOS device is locked.

Now with support for iPhone 4S and iPhone 5 devices.

Pilot the paper plane as far as possible while dodging the obstacles and facing ever increasing difficulty. Just touch and hold to glide up and release to fly down. You can quickly access Overglide from the today screen or lock screen to easily try and beat your top score anytime.

• Simply swipe down to start playing
• Accessible from the lock screen
• Simple, fun and challenging gameplay
• Customizable styles
• Game Center leaderboards
• Challenge your friends and share scores on Twitter, Facebook and Weibo

Overglide, the unique widget game featured on: Gizmodo, TouchArcade, IGN, Cult of Mac, Heise Online, TecMundo, Redmond Pie, Phone Arena, iDownloadBlog, iPhon.fr, TUAW and many other sites around the world.
